titleStmt.title: Of the incurable scepticism of the Church of Rome
De insanabili romanae Ecclesiae scepticismo. English
titleStmt.author: La Placette, Jean, 1629-1718.
Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.

notesStmt.note: Translation of La Placette's De insanabili romanae Ecclesiae scepticismo.
On reel 517: Page 129 stained in filmed copy. Pages 120-141, photographed from University of Cambridge Library copy and inserted at end.
Translated by Thomas Tennison, Abp. of Canterbury.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
